title: First Aid Offline
description: FirstAid Pocket is an interactive desktop app that provides quick, easy-to-follow first-aid instructions for common injuries and emergencies.

title: SDG Awareness App
description: Interactive mobile app promoting Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). Features quizzes, progress tracking, and educational resources.

title: Orion Desktop Assistant
description: AI-powered desktop assistant for Windows/macOS. Handles tasks like reminders, file search, and system commands using Python and voice recognition.

title: Hack The Grid Game
description: A Minimal Cyber Puzzle â€” Rotate, Connect, and Hack the Network.

title: Fraud Detection AI
description: An end-to-end machine learning system for detecting credit card fraud using supervised models, anomaly detection, and deep learning. Includes SMOTE for class imbalance, explainable AI (SHAP), interactive threshold tuning, and a Streamlit dashboard for real-time predictions.

title: Self-Learning Game Agent (Deep Q-Learning)
description: A reinforcement learning project where an AI agent learns to play Snake and Flappy Bird using Deep Q-Learning, experience replay, and target networks. Includes training, evaluation, and play-only modes with performance tracking.

title: Movie Recommender
description: Hybrid movie recommendations using content + collaborative filtering.

title: Expense Tracker
description: Server-driven expense app using Java (Maven), Python services and REST APIs. Tracks, filters and exports data.

title: Aetherborn: Portal of Worlds
description: An immersive 3D fantasy RPG built with Unity. Features a mystical world, combat system, and atmospheric environments.

title: Phantom Trails
description: Fast-paced 3D action adventure game with combat mechanics and cinematic effects.

title: Payment System Web App
description: Payment System is a secure web app to send and request money, manage transactions, and handle admin tasks.
